<!-- Image with unknown copyright status removed: [[Image:FCI Fort Worth.jpg|thumb]] --> '''Federal Correctional Institution (FCI) Fort Worth''', is a low (minimum) security institution in [[Fort Worth, Texas]] housing male offenders.
FCI Fort Worth is located in the southeastern corner of Fort Worth. It is located in the Northern Texas judicial district.
==Notable inmates== *[[Paul Vario]], [[caporegime]] of the [[Lucchese crime family]] *Larry Nevers and Walter Budzyn, Detroit police officers convicted of killing [[Malice Green]]<ref name="HRW">[http://www.hrw.org/reports98/police/uspo60.htm%20 www.hrw.org/reports98/police/uspo60.htm]</ref> *[[Vincent Gigante]], boss of the Genovese crime family from 1981 to 2005 *[[Edwin Edwards]], former governor of Louisiana convicted on racketeering charges <ref>[http://www.democraticunderground.com/discuss/duboard.php?az=view_all&address=155x294 Democratic underground.com]</ref> *[[Rubin Gottesman]], producer of pornographic films featuring an underage [[Traci Lords]] *[[Peter MacDonald (Navajo leader)|Peter MacDonald]], former [[Navajo Nation]] chief convicted of fraud, extortion, riot, bribery, and corruption *[[Jim McDougal]], financial partner with Bill Clinton and Hillary Rodham Clinton in the [[Whitewater controversy|Whitewater political scandal]] *[[Michael and Lori Fortier|Michael Fortier]], Oklahoma bombing accomplice
